name: Fill Your Plate
description:
Play as Max who has to catch the food falling from the sky to fill up his plate with a healthy meal. Fill up the nutrition plate to get points. Getting extra pieces of food for a section you have already filled will make you lose points. Watch out for the fatty oils, collect three and you lose.

Controls

Left (on Computer) / Left Button (on Android Phone) - Move Left

Right (on Computer) / RightButton (on Android Phone) - Move Right

Prototype made by:

Dhaman Mehta - Producer

Alek Johnson - Artist

Jacob Reuling - Technical Artist

Luis Garcia Remes - Engineer

Pinak Jalan - Engineer
